Spotify.playSong.description: Play a track on your active device.

Spotify.playNextSong.description: Play a next song on your active device.

Spotify.playPreviousSong.description: Play a previous song on your active device.

GoogleCalendar.addEvent.description: Add an event to your google calendar (date format : 'YYYY-MM-DD H:M:S').

GoogleYoutube.addVideoToPlaylist.description: Add video to youtube playlist (video url format : 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XXXXXXX' / playlist url format: 'https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=XXXXXXX'
